name: Project Tycho
description:
🌖 Project Tycho 👾 

The alien scourge has arrived! Only the moon can save the Earth.

A secret weapon has been built on the Moon at Tycho Base.  Hold the alien scourge at bay for as long as possible, give our Earth ships time to escape before the Earth is destroyed.

https://github.com/outrunthewolf/project-tycho

-----

This is my first game i've ever tried to make. I had to learn a lot from scratch, I hope you enjoy it, and I welcome any feedback.

-----

📙Instructions 📙

Fight the alien scourge in the ancient battle of Paper, Rock, Scissors.

🕹Controls🕹
  1. Hold down mouse to show defence radial
  2. Release mouse on chosen defence (Paper, Rock, Scissors)
  3. Hold out as long as you can.
Credits
  • 8 Bit Sound Pack: https://soundsbydane.itch.io/
  • Pixel Planets: https://helianthus-games.itch.io/
  • 8 Bit Music Booster Pack: https://bit-by-bit-sound.itch.io/8-bit-music-booster-pack
